system.description:
Effect: All [Food] items consumed since the battle began are restored to their owners. 
The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.
Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Snorlax and has a Normal-Type attack on their Active List.
